Title: Gavi to undergo knee operation on meniscus injury – Barcelona
Summary: Barcelona midfielder Gavi is to undergo surgery on his injured meniscus after other treatment failed to resolve his problem . The 21-year-old midfielder has not played since late August due to the problem . Barcelona have not played him since August .

Title: Olojo festival: Ooni begins seven-day seclusion, prays for Nigeria’s unity, peace
Summary: The Ooni of Ife, Oba Enitan Adeyeye Ogunwusi, has begun a seven-day seclusion rite in Ile-Ife, Osun State . He offered prayers for the nation's peace, progress, and unity .

Title: Pfizer to acquire obesity-drug maker Metsera for $4.9 bn
Summary: Pfizer will acquire Metsera, a maker of drugs for obesity and heart disease, for $4.9 billion . Pfizer aims to expand its portfolio by entering the huge and growing market for obesity drugs .

Title: House of Reps mandates AGF to provide details of payments to contractors
Summary: House of Reps mandates AGF to provide details of payments to contractors . Accountant-General of the Federation Shamsuldeen Ogunjimi was mandated by the House of Representatives to provide the details of the payments made to contractors as part of the N2.4 trillion approval .

Title: Argentina suspends tax on grain exports ahead of elections
Summary: Argentina’s government said Monday it will suspend taxes on grain exports . It seeks to woo farmers and revive the economy ahead of legislative elections . Presidential spokesman Manuel Adorni said these taxes will be eliminated by October .

Title: Akinkugbe was one of God’s special gifts to our nation – Obasanjo
Summary: Chief Oludolapo Ibukun Akinkugbe was an icon, hero, ardent patriot and one of God’s special gifts to our nation . Chief Olusegun Obasanjo has described the late Chief Oludeolapo  Akinugbe as an icon and hero . The former President, Chief Ol

Title: Photos of United Capital staff who died in Afriland Towers fire
Summary: The fire, which reportedly began in the inverter room in the basement of the building, also claimed four officials of the FIRS . The fire was reportedly caused by an electrical fault fault .

Title: Obasanjo third term would have saved Nigeria – PDP Youth Leader
Summary: Timothy Osadolor said Nigeria made a costly mistake by not allowing Obasanjo to have a third term in office . He argued that the country’s institutions and governance might have been stronger under his continued leadership . The Deputy National Youth Leader of the People's Democratic Party (PDP) said the former President would have saved

Title: Amotekun arrests 32-year-old suspected burglar inside Osun mosque
Summary: Operatives stormed the mosque and arrested the suspect . He confessed to the crime, saying he usually targets religious centers to perpetrate the crime .

Title: Israel to skip UN Security Council meeting on Gaza
Summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is expected to address the UN General Assembly on Friday . Benjamin Netanyahu will be the first Israeli to speak to the UN on Gaza .
